sect1.title: Streams
sect1.para: Streams allow you to use PHP streams as a template resource or a variable resource. The syntax is much the same a traditional template resource names.

Smarty will first look for a registered template resource. If nothing is found, it will check if a PHP stream is available. If a stream is available, Smarty will use it to fetch the template.
You can further define allowed streams with security enabled.

sect1.para: You can also use streams to call variables. {$foo:bar} will use the foo://bar stream to get the template variable.
